https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/35sptWiNTyHyoKICfyC4jTtXKV2.jpg Live at the Palladium is a live concert DVD by the punk band Bad Religion, released in March 2006. It features footage from two nights at the Palladium in Hollywood, California on November 21 and 22, 2004. Bad Religion: Live at the Palladium
